paragraph.heading: 2Compiling

list.item: Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK.

Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file. If you select another directory than the default one, please copy images (*.bmp), icons (*.ico) and resource files (*.rc) from the default directory (the one containing the Ace file) to the new one.

paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the program, a window will be displayed as illustrated above. Selecting or expanding one of the tree items will cause notification to be displayed in the list at the top of the window. Various other notifications are also displayed, such as pressing a key in the tree.
paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph:
TREEVIEW inherits ../../reference/controls/wel_tree_view_chart.xmlWEL_TREE_VIEW and redefines make to initialize items within the tree. A ../../reference/structs/wel_tree_view_insert_struct_chart.xmlWEL_TREE_VIEW_INSERT_STRUCT is used to insert each ../../reference/structs/wel_tree_view_item_chart.xmlWEL_TREE_VIEW_ITEM while a ../../reference/structs/wel_image_list_chart.xmlWEL_IMAGE_LIST is used to reference images within the tree. This sample contains the following classes:
TREEVIEW
MAIN_WINDOW
TREEVIEW_DEMO
APPLICATION_IDS
